title: Inflation, Uncertainty, and Monetary Policy
content: Bord of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   7  September 26, 2017                                 Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System                         7  Figure 7 Other Indicators Are at or above Pre-recession Levels  30  40  50  60  70  80  90  100  110  120  130  140  150  30   40   50   60   70   80   90   100   110   120   130   140   150   2000 2001 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017  Private quits rate Private jobs opening rate Job availability* Jobs hard to fill**  Index (2007 = 100)      Note: All series are 3-month moving averages, rescaled so that 2007 equals 100. *Portion of households surveyed believing that jobs are plentiful minus the portion believing they are hard to get, plus 100. **Percent of small businesses surveyed with at least one hard-to-fill job.     Source: Bureau of Labor Statistics; Conference Board; National Federation of Independent Business.
